items.name: modifier_mapping
items.title: Points Modifier Mapping
items.tooltip: You will need to map the plans on the site with the points modifier. If you enter 2, user will get 2x points in EasySocial.

items.name: allow_stack
items.title: Enable Points Modifier Stacking
items.tooltip:
If enabled, system will stack/combine the point modifiers if user has more than one plans subscribed.

By default, this option is disabled and system will use the highest multiplier if user has multiple plans subscribed.
